attributes.action: Pressure Turkey for the Immediate Return of Varosha to the Republic of Cyprus
attributes.additional_details:
Her Majesty's Government is asked to clearly pressure Turkey for the immediate return of Varosha, an invaded coastal town area in Famagusta, Cyprus to the legitimate control of the Republic of Cyprus.

We, the undersigned, believe that exerting pressure on Turkey to return Varosha is an essential step forward in resolving the diplomatic deadlock between Greek Cypriot and Turkish Cypriot communities.
